amendment.description: To amend the reconciliation instructions for certain committees to fund border security and to ensure the enforcement of all immigration laws.

vote.text: Amendment SA 872 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 42.

action.text: Amendment SA 872 proposed by Senator Scott FL. (consideration: CR S452; text: CR S452) To amend the reconciliation instructions for certain committees to fund border security and to ensure the enforcement of all immigration laws.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 872 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 42.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 872 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 42.
